Own Choice from a Specified List
Clay Cross, Derbyshire March contest 1st Lea Mills, 2nd Hasland. 10 bands entered, 4 competed Bands had a choice of 3 test pieces to choose from.
March 10, 2012, 12:22 p.m. Sept. 15, 2018, 8:02 a.m.

3 Hasland Angus Holden Cluster of Classics
4 Rotherham Main Colliery William Wilson Dinorah [arr. Godfrey]
